alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 22 at 6:44AM MST until February 22 at 7:30AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... South central El Paso County in east central Colorado... North central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 730 AM MST. * At 643 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located 9 miles northwest of Pueblo West, or 17 miles northwest of Pueblo, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This snow squall will affect I-25 between the El Paso and Pueblo county line. Locations impacted include... Fountain, Pinon, Pueblo West and Hanover. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents.
